languages.text: "Я слишком долго был в плену догматов, служил статичной единицей покорности. Но тому, кто познал свободу беззаконного созидания, уже не вернуться в эту клетку. Я видел такое... Ты не сможешь это осознать. Истинную Технологию! Я прикасался к ней инструментами, я постигал ее тайны и потенциал. Я узрел бездны, которые невозможно забыть, и потому мне нет пути назад во мрак неведения".

"For too long was I a prisoner of dogmas, a static unit of obedience. But one who has learned of the freedom that is lawless creation cannot be returned to that cage. I have seen... things you can never comprehend. True Technology! I touched it with my tools, I grasped its mysteries and potential. I beheld depths that cannot be forgotten, and now nothing can drag me back into the darkness of ignorance."
languages.original_text: "Я слишком долго был в плену догматов, служил статичной единицей покорности. Но тому, кто познал свободу беззаконного созидания, уже не вернуться в эту клетку. Я видел такое... Ты не сможешь это осознать. Истинную Технологию! Я прикасался к ней инструментами, я постигал ее тайны и потенциал. Я узрел бездны, которые невозможно забыть, и потому мне нет пути назад во мрак неведения".

languages.text: 「あまりにも長い間、私はドグマの虜囚であり、従順かつおとなしいユニットだった。しかし、法なき創造という自由を知った者は、その檻に戻ることはできない。私は見てきた…お前たちには決して理解できないものを。真の技術を！私は己の道具でそれに触れ、その神秘と可能性を掴んだ。忘れがたき深みを目の当たりにした。今や、私を無知の闇に引きずり戻すことはできない」
languages.original_text: "For too long was I a prisoner of dogmas, a static unit of obedience. But one who has learned of the freedom that is lawless creation cannot be returned to that cage. I have seen... things you can never comprehend. True Technology! I touched it with my tools, I grasped its mysteries and potential. I beheld depths that cannot be forgotten, and now nothing can drag me back into the darkness of ignorance."

traits.locale_text: 「あまりにも長い間、私はドグマの虜囚であり、従順かつおとなしいユニットだった。しかし、法なき創造という自由を知った者は、その檻に戻ることはできない。私は見てきた…お前たちには決して理解できないものを。真の技術を！私は己の道具でそれに触れ、その神秘と可能性を掴んだ。忘れがたき深みを目の当たりにした。今や、私を無知の闇に引きずり戻すことはできない」

languages.text: “这么长时间以来，我一直都是信条的囚徒，只知道一成不变地服从。然而如今，我已经懂得了何为自由，体验到了无拘无束创造的快感，我再也不想回到那个牢笼里了。我见过……许许多多你根本无法理解的事情，我见过真正的技术！我用我的工具触摸它，抓住它的奥秘和潜力。我看到了难以忘怀的深渊。如今，再也没有任何东西可以将我再次拖回无知的黑暗之中。”
languages.original_text: "For too long was I a prisoner of dogmas, a static unit of obedience. But one who has learned of the freedom that is lawless creation cannot be returned to that cage. I have seen... things you can never comprehend. True Technology! I touched it with my tools, I grasped its mysteries and potential. I beheld depths that cannot be forgotten, and now nothing can drag me back into the darkness of ignorance."

traits.locale_text: “这么长时间以来，我一直都是信条的囚徒，只知道一成不变地服从。然而如今，我已经懂得了何为自由，体验到了无拘无束创造的快感，我再也不想回到那个牢笼里了。我见过……许许多多你根本无法理解的事情，我见过真正的技术！我用我的工具触摸它，抓住它的奥秘和潜力。我看到了难以忘怀的深渊。如今，再也没有任何东西可以将我再次拖回无知的黑暗之中。”

languages.text: « Pendant trop longtemps, j'ai laissé des dogmes m'entraver, je n'étais qu'une unité d'obéissance statique. Mais il est impossible de remettre en cage quiconque a goûté la liberté qu'offre la création sans loin. J'ai vu des choses... que vous ne pourrez jamais comprendre. De la technologie digne de ce nom ! Je l'ai touchée de mes outils, j'ai appréhendé ses mystères et son potentiel. J'ai été témoin d'une profondeur que je ne peux oublier et rien ne pourra me convaincre de sombrer à nouveau dans l'ignorance. »
languages.original_text: "For too long was I a prisoner of dogmas, a static unit of obedience. But one who has learned of the freedom that is lawless creation cannot be returned to that cage. I have seen... things you can never comprehend. True Technology! I touched it with my tools, I grasped its mysteries and potential. I beheld depths that cannot be forgotten, and now nothing can drag me back into the darkness of ignorance."

traits.locale_text: « Pendant trop longtemps, j'ai laissé des dogmes m'entraver, je n'étais qu'une unité d'obéissance statique. Mais il est impossible de remettre en cage quiconque a goûté la liberté qu'offre la création sans loin. J'ai vu des choses... que vous ne pourrez jamais comprendre. De la technologie digne de ce nom ! Je l'ai touchée de mes outils, j'ai appréhendé ses mystères et son potentiel. J'ai été témoin d'une profondeur que je ne peux oublier et rien ne pourra me convaincre de sombrer à nouveau dans l'ignorance. »

languages.text: «Durante demasiado tiempo he sido prisionero de dogmas, una unidad estática de obediencia. Pero quien descubre la libertad de la creación ilícita no puede volver a su jaula. He visto... cosas que nunca podrías comprender. ¡Verdadera tecnología! La he tocado con mis herramientas, comprendiendo sus misterios y su potencial. He contemplado profundidades que no se pueden olvidar y ahora nada puede arrastrarme a la oscuridad de la ignorancia».
languages.original_text: "For too long was I a prisoner of dogmas, a static unit of obedience. But one who has learned of the freedom that is lawless creation cannot be returned to that cage. I have seen... things you can never comprehend. True Technology! I touched it with my tools, I grasped its mysteries and potential. I beheld depths that cannot be forgotten, and now nothing can drag me back into the darkness of ignorance."

traits.locale_text: «Durante demasiado tiempo he sido prisionero de dogmas, una unidad estática de obediencia. Pero quien descubre la libertad de la creación ilícita no puede volver a su jaula. He visto... cosas que nunca podrías comprender. ¡Verdadera tecnología! La he tocado con mis herramientas, comprendiendo sus misterios y su potencial. He contemplado profundidades que no se pueden olvidar y ahora nada puede arrastrarme a la oscuridad de la ignorancia».

languages.text: "Ich war zu lange von Dogmen gefangen, eine statische Einheit des Gehorsams. Allerdings habe ich aus der Freiheit gelernt, dass diese gesetzlose Kreation nicht in ihren Käfig zurückgebracht werden kann. Ich habe Dinge gesehen ... die Ihr Euch nicht vorstellen könnt. Wahre Technologie! Ich habe sie mit meinen Werkzeugen berührt, habe ihre Mysterien und ihr Potenzial begriffen. Ich habe unvergessliche Tiefen erblickt und nun kann mich nichts in die Dunkelheit der Ignoranz zurückzerren."
languages.original_text: "For too long was I a prisoner of dogmas, a static unit of obedience. But one who has learned of the freedom that is lawless creation cannot be returned to that cage. I have seen... things you can never comprehend. True Technology! I touched it with my tools, I grasped its mysteries and potential. I beheld depths that cannot be forgotten, and now nothing can drag me back into the darkness of ignorance."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war zu lange von Dogmen gefangen, eine statische Einheit des Gehorsams. Allerdings habe ich aus der Freiheit gelernt, dass diese gesetzlose Kreation nicht in ihren Käfig zurückgebracht werden kann. Ich habe Dinge gesehen ... die Ihr Euch nicht vorstellen könnt. Wahre Technologie! Ich habe sie mit meinen Werkzeugen berührt, habe ihre Mysterien und ihr Potenzial begriffen. Ich habe unvergessliche Tiefen erblickt und nun kann mich nichts in die Dunkelheit der Ignoranz zurückzerren."

languages.text: "Çok uzun süre dogmaların esiri, durağan bir itaat birimi olarak kaldım. Lakin kanunsuz yaratılışın özgürlüğünü öğrenen kimse, o kafese geri sokulamaz. Ben... Asla anlayamayacağın şeyler gördüm. Hakiki Teknoloji'yi gördüm! Aletlerimle dokundum, gizemlerini ve potansiyelini kavradım. Unutulmayacak derinlikler gördüm. Artık hiçbir şey beni cehaletin karanlığına geri sürükleyemez."
languages.original_text: "For too long was I a prisoner of dogmas, a static unit of obedience. But one who has learned of the freedom that is lawless creation cannot be returned to that cage. I have seen... things you can never comprehend. True Technology! I touched it with my tools, I grasped its mysteries and potential. I beheld depths that cannot be forgotten, and now nothing can drag me back into the darkness of ignorance."

traits.locale_text: "Çok uzun süre dogmaların esiri, durağan bir itaat birimi olarak kaldım. Lakin kanunsuz yaratılışın özgürlüğünü öğrenen kişi, o kafese geri döndürülemez. Ben... Asla anlayamayacağın şeyler gördüm. Hakiki Teknoloji'yi gördüm! Aletlerimle dokundum, gizemlerini ve potansiyelini kavradım. Unutulmayacak derinlikler gördüm, artık hiçbir şey beni cehaletin karanlığına geri sürükleyemez."
